	- amount = getPurchaseReturn(_reserveToken,_depositAmount) (/unique_chucks/2/0xca83bd8c4c7b1c0409b25fbd7e70b1ef57629ff4.sol#634-636)

	External calls:
	- require(bool)(_sellAmount <= token.balanceOf(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/2/0xca83bd8c4c7b1c0409b25fbd7e70b1ef57629ff4.sol#662-665)

	- reserveBalance = getReserveBalance(_reserveToken) (/unique_chucks/2/0xca83bd8c4c7b1c0409b25fbd7e70b1ef57629ff4.sol#669)
	- tokenSupply = token.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/2/0xca83bd8c4c7b1c0409b25fbd7e70b1ef57629ff4.sol#671)
